item.title: LDA and R-MDA
item.description: This is a note of Linear Discriminant Analysis (LDA) and an original Regularized Matrix Discriminant Analysis (R-MDA) method proposed by Jie Su et al, 2018. Both methods are suitable for efficient multiclass classification, while the latter is a state-of-the-art version of the classical LDA method s.t. data in matrix forms can be classified without destroying the original structure. A Sketch of LDA The plain idea behind Discriminant Analysis is to find the optimal partition (or projection, for higher-dimensional problems) s.
